name: Not Alone (Marcos GamesDev)
description:
Not Alone is a 2D action game, in which you need to achieve the highest score possible.

The game has been developed in Unreal Engine 4 using C++. All the scripts used in this project are mine, except the player controller script which is provided by default by UE4 and has been modified by me. The following elements, used in this project, are not mine:

Wrong choice sound: https://freesound.org/people/unadamlar/sounds/476177/

Correct choice sound: https://freesound.org/people/unadamlar/sounds/476178/

Selection sound: https://freesound.org/people/broumbroum/sounds/50559/

UI Button sound: https://freesound.org/people/NenadSimic/sounds/171697/

Main menu and background music: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
